entry.title: VUE
entry.summary: The Visual Understanding Environment (VUE) is an Open Source project based at Tufts University. The VUE project is focused on creating flexible tools for managing and integrating digital resources in support of teaching, learning and research. VUE provides a flexible visual environment for structuring, presenting, and sharing digital information.

entry.title: Delicious
entry.summary: Delicious is a Yahoo-owned, web-based tool for tagging URLs on the web.

entry.title: Content and Concept Mapping Features
entry.summary: The content and concept mapping feature for organizing instructional materials for individual courses or entire curricula, creating educational resources, to visualize lessons, consolidate and educational topics in both nonlinear (eg, concept maps) and linear ways (eg, calendaring).

entry.title: Flickr
entry.summary: Flickr is a tool for managing photos and videos, and for forming groups around archives.

entry.title: Multimedia Management Features
entry.summary: Support for multimedia uploading and management for engaging students; to simplify a task that would otherwise be a major technical hurdle.
